material: cast iron with half neoprene coating
usage: Strength training, toning and full-body workouts in gym or home workout settings using kettlebell exercises.
key_features: 5 KG weight clearly marked on the body

Give your body the total toning and strengthening workout
ai_description: A compact 5 KG KAKSS kettlebell featuring a smooth pink coated body and a contrasting textured black handle. The front displays the KAKSS logo and clear 5 KG marking in white. Its rounded base and sturdy arched handle are designed for controlled swings, lifts and gym use.
target_audience: Fitness enthusiasts, gym-goers, and individuals looking to perform kettlebell-based strength and toning workouts.
product_name: Kakss Half Coating Neoprene Kettlebell (Pink, 5 KG)
